description: Dependencies needed for Next.js Enterprise Template

install_commands.required: npm install next react react-dom clsx tailwind-merge class-variance-authority zod
install_commands.dev_dependencies: npm install -D @types/node @types/react @types/react-dom eslint eslint-config-next @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin @typescript-eslint/parser eslint-plugin-react eslint-plugin-react-hooks eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y prettier typescript tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer tailwindcss-animate @tailwindcss/typography @tailwindcss/container-queries postcss-import postcss-nested cssnano

notes.clsx: Utility for constructing className strings conditionally
notes.tailwind-merge: Utility to merge Tailwind CSS classes without style conflicts
notes.class-variance-authority: Tool for building type-safe component APIs with variants
notes.zod: TypeScript-first schema validation with static type inference
notes.tailwindcss: Utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development
notes.@tailwindcss/typography: Beautiful typographic defaults for HTML you don't control
notes.@tailwindcss/container-queries: Container query utilities for responsive design
notes.postcss-import: PostCSS plugin to transform @import rules by inlining content
notes.postcss-nested: PostCSS plugin to unwrap nested rules like Sass
notes.cssnano: Modern CSS minifier for production optimization
